overview: This is Natasha's third year at the Russian Institute, a year in which she decides to begin her sexual diary. Her first entry begins with a young and beautiful student named Suzie. She's a nymphomaniac girl that takes Natasha on a discovery to all the special events and her first, special French lessons based on the "basics" with a young stud.  A deep entry in the sexual universe of a luxury boarding school where extreme pleasure is education.
title: Russian Institute: Lesson 8
